de.bioforscher.singa.structure.model.mmtf

Class MmtfModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bioforscher.singa.structure.model.mmtf.MmtfModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomContainer, ChainContainer, LeafSubstructureContainer, Model

    public class MmtfModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Model
    The implementation of Model for mmtf structures. Remembers the index of the model and a mapping of chain identifiers relevant for this model, as well as their respective identifiers in the chain data arrays.

      • removeLeafSubstructuresNotRelevantFor

        public void removeLeafSubstructuresNotRelevantFor(LeafSubstructureContainer leafSubstructuresToKeep)
        Description copied from interface: LeafSubstructureContainer
        Removes all LeafSubstructures from this container that are not referenced in the given LeafSubstructureContainer. Basically all LeafSubstructures are removed that do not match any of the given containers families. This method also keeps exchangeable families if any are defined.
        Specified by:
        removeLeafSubstructuresNotRelevantFor in interface LeafSubstructureContainer
        Parameters:
        leafSubstructuresToKeep - The leaf structures that are kept.
